description: MITRE ATT&CK technique mappings for reference

reconnaissance.name: Reconnaissance
reconnaissance.description: The adversary is trying to gather information they can use to plan future operations.

initial_access.name: Initial Access
initial_access.description: The adversary is trying to get into your network.

execution.name: Execution
execution.description: The adversary is trying to run malicious code.

persistence.name: Persistence
persistence.description: The adversary is trying to maintain their foothold.

privilege_escalation.name: Privilege Escalation
privilege_escalation.description: The adversary is trying to gain higher-level permissions.

defense_evasion.name: Defense Evasion
defense_evasion.description: The adversary is trying to avoid being detected.

credential_access.name: Credential Access
credential_access.description: The adversary is trying to steal account names and passwords.

discovery.name: Discovery
discovery.description: The adversary is trying to figure out your environment.

lateral_movement.name: Lateral Movement
lateral_movement.description: The adversary is trying to move through your environment.

collection.name: Collection
collection.description: The adversary is trying to gather data of interest to their goal.

exfiltration.name: Exfiltration
exfiltration.description: The adversary is trying to steal data.

impact.name: Impact
impact.description: The adversary is trying to manipulate, interrupt, or destroy your systems and data.
